typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderDetailId as integer,
		OrderId as integer,
		Email as string,
		ProductId as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from orderdetails',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> SourceOrderDetails
source(output(
		OrderId as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Country as string,
		Phone as string,
		SMSOptIn as boolean,
		SMSStatus as string,
		Email as string,
		ReceiptUrl as string,
		Total as decimal(18,2),
		PaymentTransactionId as string,
		HasBeenShipped as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from orders',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> SourceOrderHeader
JoinIt select(mapColumn(
		OrderId = SourceOrderHeader@OrderId,
		OrderDate,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		Address,
		City,
		State,
		PostalCode,
		Country,
		Phone,
		SMSOptIn,
		SMSStatus,
		Email = SourceOrderHeader@Email,
		ReceiptUrl,
		Total,
		PaymentTransactionId,
		HasBeenShipped,
		OrderDetailId,
		Email = SourceOrderDetails@Email,
		ProductId,
		Quantity,
		UnitPrice
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ColumnScrubber
SourceOrderHeader, Typecast join(SourceOrderHeader@OrderId == OrderDetailId,
	joinType:'inner',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinIt
ColumnScrubber derive(Total = toDouble(round(Total,2)),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> ValueScrubber
ValueScrubber aggregate(groupBy(orderId = ColumnScrubber@OrderId),
	details = collect(orderdetailsstruct),
		each(match(instr(name,'OrderQty')==0&&instr(name,'UnitPrice')==0&&instr(name,'SalesOrderID')==0), $$ = first($$)),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> CreateArrays
SourceOrderDetails derive(UnitPrice = toDouble(round(UnitPrice,2)),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> Typecast
CreateArrays sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/orderID'],
	throughput: 2000,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		orderID = CreateArrays@orderID,
		details,
		OrderId = CreateArrays@orderId,
		OrderDate,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		Address,
		City,
		State,
		PostalCode,
		Country,
		Phone,
		SMSOptIn,
		SMSStatus,
		Email,
		ReceiptUrl,
		Total,
		PaymentTransactionId,
		HasBeenShipped,
		ProductId,
		Quantity
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> SinktoCosmosDB
